definitions.definition: prevent (someone) from giving full attention to something.
examples: don't allow noise to distract you from your work
synonyms: put off More"let's not distract Dionne while she's painting"disturbing

examples: it was another attempt to distract attention from the truth

definitions.definition: divert one's attention from something worrying or unpleasant by doing something different or more pleasurable.
examples: I tried to distract myself by concentrating on Jane
horror and doubt distract His troubl'd thoughts
